name.en: Seminar on Strategic Human Resource Management
name.ch: 策略性人力資源管理專題研究

department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程旨在讓碩士班學生深入理解策略性人力資源管理的核心概念、理論框架及其在企業的應用。透過本課程的學習，學生將掌握如何將人力資源管理作為一種策略性工具，支持組織目標的實現，提升企業的競爭優勢。課程強調將人力資源與企業策略相結合，以應對現代商業環境中的挑戰和變化。
goal.en: This course aims to provide master‘s students with a comprehensive understanding of the core concepts of Strategic Human Resource Management (SHRM) and its application in business. Through this course, students will learn how to utilize human resource management as a strategic tool to support organizational goals and enhance competitive advantage. The course emphasizes integrating human resource with strategies to address the challenges and changes in the modern business environment.

outline.ch: 本課程將包含策略性人力資源管理概論、人力資源策略的設計與實施、人力資源管理與組織績效、策略性人力資源管理研究方法等
outline.en: The course will include an introduction to Strategic Human Resource Management, the design and implementation of HR strategies, the relationship between HR management and organizational performance, and research methods in Strategic Human Resource Management.
